post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Mentoring Program
- Monthly rate but least three month duration program - Face to face mentoring every other week - Weekly progress report and check list - 2 to 3 times phone conversation - unlimited e-mail or messenger chat
Qualification of Mentor - currently employed at the respectable company - at least 5 and o more years of experience - preferable minimum 5 years in Canada
Etiquette for Mentee - always prepare for questions - do weekly progress report and follow check list - do not take too much of mentorâ€™s time
post.title: Mentoing Program
